channel.title: How to add custom whips with their own stats? (also, sheilds,armour,helemts,etc
channel.description: hey im new, trying to get a server up, i would like to know how to add custom items like whips, armorer, etc and how to add stats and specials to them ive looked in tut but no luck =/ if anyone would be kind enough to teach me that be awesome

item.title: How to add custom whips with their own stats? (also, sheilds,armour,helemts,etc
item.dc:creator: @Medizine Medizine
item.description:
@Medizine wrote:

go to models tab on mopar and look through them

but if you have PI you need to get different ints so i suggest going on google.com and searching Pi models with ints or something along those lines. models are items such as dragon claws or skillcapes

item.source: How to add custom whips with their own stats? (also, sheilds,armour,helemts,etc

item.title: How to add custom whips with their own stats? (also, sheilds,armour,helemts,etc
item.dc:creator: @Medizine Medizine
item.description:
@Medizine wrote:

well adding items go in your client you put the models in your models folder and your ints go in your class8.java if its a nonrenamed client and if its a renamed client your ints go in item.def then you save an compile log in to your server and type “add models” if its nonrenamed if its renamed type “::modeldump”

Read full topic
